title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. XX, subch. D, pt. 2213 - The New York Higher Education Loan Program (nyhelps)
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. XX, subch. D, pt. 2213 - The New York Higher Education Loan Program (nyhelps)

State Regulations
§ 2213.1 - Definitions
§ 2213.2 - Borrower eligibility requirements
§ 2213.3 - College eligibility requirements
§ 2213.4 - Lender eligibility requirements
§ 2213.5 - Due diligence in originating, disbursing, and servicing program loans
§ 2213.6 - Application content
§ 2213.7 - Fixed rate program loans
§ 2213.8 - Variable rate program loans
§ 2213.9 - Minimum/maximum program loan limits
§ 2213.10 - Default fees
§ 2213.11 - Program loan verification requirements
§ 2213.12 - Prohibited transactions
§ 2213.13 - College certification requirements
§ 2213.14 - Processing program loan proceeds
§ 2213.15 - Processing program loan refunds
§ 2213.16 - Disclosure requirements for participating colleges
§ 2213.17 - Disclosure requirements for participating lenders
§ 2213.18 - Reporting requirements for participating colleges
§ 2213.19 - Reporting/retention requirements for participating holders
§ 2213.20 - Program loan repayment
§ 2213.21 - Due diligence for program loan delinquency
§ 2213.22 - Default claims
§ 2213.23 - Loan collection efforts
§ 2213.24 - Administrative wage garnishment
§ 2213.25 - Bankruptcy
§ 2213.26 - Program loan consolidation
§ 2213.27 - Program audits
§ 2213.28 - Incorporation by reference

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. XX, subch. D, pt. 2213

Higher Education Services Corporation adopted Part 2200-a
which is published below as Part 2213 to accommodate the numbering scheme of
the NYCRR. Statutory authority: Education Law, §§653, 655, 691, 692

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
